svcproc.title: Cab Door
svcproc.para: Getting a good cab door to door opening fit requires a knowledge of where the various adjustments are located and what effect each adjustment has on door fit. These adjustments apply whether door has been removed or door adjustment is simply being changed or improved.

When the door is properly adjusted, it should fit the opening with 1/4 to 5/16 inch (6 to 8 mm) space all around the door frame. A newspaper sheet should not be able to pass between the weather seal and door frame (paper should tear).

step1.para: Door weather seal should contact the door frame with slight pressure but without damage to the seal.
Door should latch, lock and release without undue effort.
Door should not rattle when vehicle is moving.
